title: Kept
description: One fateful night changed Autumn's life forever when her eyes met with those of the infamous crime lord, Cage Zisgani. In a single moment he saw her and knew that she had to be his. No matter the cost. However, the price of his obsession may end up destroying everything he's worked to create. While Autumn struggles to survive and adapt to a world she never knew existed, Cage is dragged into a war he can't afford to lose. And as Autumn learns just how dangerous this new world is, and how far Cage will go to keep her, she finds that there is more at risk here than just her life. Because this dangerous man who has taken her from her life, this man she should hate, can leave her trembling and breathless with nothing more than a kiss...
author: Timothy Terry
